- ABC, abstractmethod%0A%0Aclass Account(ABC):%0A    def __init__(self, accId: int, clientId: str, typeId: str):%0A        self.accId = accId%0A        self.clientId = clientId%0A        self.typeId = typeId%0A        self.balance = 0.0%0A%0A    def deposit(self, value: float):%0A        self.balance += value%0A%0A    def withdraw(self, value: float):%0A        if self.balance %3C value:%0A            print(%22fail: saldo insuficiente%22)%0A            return False%0A        self.balance -= value%0A        return True%0A%0A    def transfer(self, other, value: float):%0A        if self.withdraw(value):%0A            other.deposit(value)%0A%0A    def getBalance(self):%0A        return self.balance%0A%0A    def getId(self):%0A        return self.accId%0A%0A    def getClientId(self):%0A        return self.clientId%0A%0A    def getTypeId(self):%0A        return self.typeId%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def updateMonthly(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.accId%7D:%7Bself.clientId%7D:%7Bself.balance:.2f%7D:%7Bself.typeId%7D%22%0A%0A%0Aclass CheckingAccount(Account):%0A    def __init__(self, accId: int, clientId: str):%0A        super().__init__(accId, clientId, %22CC%22)%0A        self.monthlyFee = 20.0%0A%0A    def updateMonthly(self):%0A        self.balance -= self.monthlyFee%0A%0A%0Aclass SavingsAccount(Account):%0A    def __init__(self, accId: int, clientId: str):%0A        super().__init__(accId, clientId, %22CP%22)%0A        self.monthlyInterest = 0.01%0A%0A    def updateMonthly(self):%0A        self.balance += self.balance * self.monthlyInterest%0A%0A%0Aclass

 def deposit(self, accId: int, value: float):%0A        acc = self.getAccount(accId)%0A        if acc:%0A            acc.deposit(value)%0A%0A    def withdraw(self, accId: int, value: float):%0A
